attributes.action: We demand a maximum call charge for premium rate numbers that provide no product.
attributes.additional_details:
The practice of companies insisting on the use of 0844 and other premium rate numbers with no end product other than to resolve a query must be brought to a close.

This practice is nothing short of usury and companies deliberately keep people waiting for the duration of a medium term ice-age to drive up their own profits.

It must stop!
